channel.title: Expert Sessions on hexdevs
channel.description: Recent content in Expert Sessions on hexdevs

item.title: How does the Faker Ruby Gem Work?
item.description: How does the Faker Ruby gem work? How do you contribute to an Open Source Ruby project? Know exactly how by watching us do it live!

item.title: Climb your Way Up to Senior Ruby Dev with Fabiano Beselga
item.description: How do you get promoted to Senior level? How do Engineering paths work? Fabiano Beselga answered the most common questions about Ruby career promotions, climbing up the Engineering Ladder, and how to get to Senior level. Watch the conversation now!

item.title: TenderJIT: A JIT compiler for Ruby with Aaron Patterson (tenderlove)
item.description: Let's work on a JIT compiler for Ruby that’s written in Ruby! We’re going to start building a JIT for Ruby from the ground up. First, we’ll learn how Ruby’s virtual machine works, then talk about the CPU itself. Finally we’ll start building a JIT for Ruby in Ruby. This session happened on September 30th, 2021.

item.title: Open Source Thursdays Expert Session with Rafael França on Aug 5th
item.description: Contribute to Ruby on Rails with Rafael França, Rails Core team member, on August 5th

item.title: Just Enough Hotwire for Rails Developers with Chris Oliver
item.description: Learn Just enough Hotwire for Rails Developers with Chris Oliver (GoRails)
